description: The film and stage director Atom Egoyan talks with Daniel J. Wakin, deputy culture editor at The Times.
title: TimesTalks Luminato Festival Video: Atom Egoyan
title_page: TimesTalks Luminato Festival Video: Atom Egoyan - The New York Times
text: The film and stage director Atom Egoyan, whose films include “The Sweet Hereafter,” “Chloe” and the coming “Devil’s Knot,” and whose production of Guo Wenjing’s opera “Feng Yi Ting” is part of the Luminato 2013 Premiere Series, talks with Daniel J. Wakin, deputy culture editor at The Times.
